summary: The document is a restricted FBI report from March 17, 1964, detailing an alleged Cuban plot to assassinate the President of Panama, aimed at inciting uprisings within the country. The information was sourced from Orlande Piedra, a former member of the Cuban Federal Police, who obtained it from a credible contact in Cuba. This sensitive report was exclusively shared among specific U.S. government agencies, with strict instructions against further dissemination.
key_findings: The document reveals an alleged plot by Cuba to assassinate the President of Panama in 1964.
Orlande Piedra, a former Cuban Federal Police member, was the informant.
The information was considered sensitive and restricted within U.S. government agencies.
